articles.author: The Conversation
articles.title: Deadly 'Zombie Drug' Believed to Contain Human Bones Wreaks Havoc in West Africa - ScienceAlert
articles.description: A new drug called kush is wreaking havoc in west Africa, particularly in Sierra Leone where it is estimated to kill around a dozen people each week and hospitalise thousands.
articles.content:
A new drug called kush is wreaking havoc in west Africa, particularly in Sierra Leone where it is estimated to kill around a dozen people each week and hospitalise thousands.
